title: Coffee pot
text: The maker of the coffeepot, Alexander Petrie, was a successful silversmith in colonial Charleston and his silver is highlighted today in several southern museum collections.  The Charleston Museum and the Museum of Early Southern Decorative Arts in Winston-Salem, North Carolina own similar coffeepots.
description: coffeepot with lighthouse body with flared foot and cast spout with shell motif on base of spout; modified urn finial; mahogany handle
creditline: The James Ford Bell Family Foundation Fund
